Mr. Mike Pence also enjoys the support of two former GOP congressmen from Indiana-David McIntosh and Chris Chocola , who now runs the Club for Growth. Mike Pence has a Reagan quality to him that is lacking in many of the other first tier Republican candidates, said Mr. McIntosh. Mr. Mike Pence won the straw poll at a gathering of more than 1,000 social conservatives in Washington, D.C., over the summer-besting Newt Gingrich , Mike Huckabee , and presumptive front-runner Mitt Romney .
